tasks.description: Two friends (Anna and Tom) in a casual setting. Anna is holding a birthday invitation card and smiling while talking to Tom. Modern apartment or cafe background. Both looking happy and engaged in conversation.
tasks.context: Opening dialog where Anna invites Tom to her birthday party on March 3rd at 7pm

specs.style: friendly, casual, warm colors, celebration theme

tasks.description: Elegant birthday invitation card with decorative elements (balloons, ribbons). The card should have German text visible like 'Einladung' and show typical German party invitation design with date and time details.
Birthday party celebration scene with people gathered around a decorated table with cake, balloons, and decorations. Happy, festive atmosphere with diverse group of guests celebrating together.
Person carrying food items (salad bowl, cake, or dish) to bring to a party. Friendly, helpful expression. Kitchen or doorway setting, person ready to leave for the party.
Beautifully wrapped gift box with ribbon and bow. Could be multiple gifts stacked together. Festive, colorful wrapping paper typical for German celebrations (not too flashy, elegant).

specs.style: festive, elegant, warm colors, gift-giving theme

tasks.description: German home entrance scene showing typical customs: person removing shoes at the door, Hausschuhe (house slippers) visible, guest holding flowers and wine (traditional German Mitbringsel). Welcoming, clean, organized entrance.
tasks.context: Cultural note: German party customs - punctuality, bringing gifts, removing shoes
tasks.notes: Should clearly show German cultural aspects: shoes at door, appropriate Mitbringsel

tasks.description: Group of diverse party guests mingling at a celebration. People holding drinks, talking, laughing. Various ages, casual-elegant attire. Festive living room or party venue background with decorations.

Full birthday invitation dialog scene. Anna invites Tom: 'Ich lade dich zu meiner Geburtstagsfeier ein. Am dritten März um 19 Uhr.' Tom responds enthusiastically: 'Oh wie schön! Vielen Dank für die Einladung. Ich komme gern!' Anna asks: 'Kannst du vielleicht einen Salat mitbringen?' Tom replies: 'Natürlich! Soll ich noch etwas anderes bringen?' Scene shows friends in casual setting, Anna possibly showing invitation details.
tasks.context: Demonstrating how to invite someone and respond to invitations in German, using separable verbs (einladen, mitbringen)

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, friendly, conversational tone

tasks.notes: Actors should speak naturally at moderate pace. Show gestures for dates and bringing items.
